summary: This add atmosphere and setails to the lifeless Dawnstar village.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=3][color=\"#555555\"]Mod Name: Reaper\'s Atmospheric Town -Dawnstar-
By: Reaper9111
Version: 1 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/246395/?]Picture Showcase[/url][/color][/size][/b][/center]



[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Description[/color][/size][/b]
===========
This mod add atmosphere and details to the lifeless Dawnstar village.
Bring life hwere is was needed, without making the mod too heavy.
-1 general store added with 1 npc
-1 house added with 1 npc
-Farm animal added
-Old lighthouse added
-Added 1 follower (near the bay at her camp)
-Multiple details added (mostly around the bay) but it\'s usualy everyhwere is was needed.
The mod is compatible 100% with W.A.T.E.R. (waves addon),i recommend this mod.
Nav mesh is 100% fonctional (no stuck npc\'s) and the Vampire attack (from Dawnguard) are 100% unaffected.
I ONLY EDITED THE EXTERIOR of Dawnstar (not interiors cells )so it\'s 100% compatible with interior mods...
I\'m using this mod along with: ETaC = Expend Towns & Cities (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13608) without any problem.
If your tired of the very boring Dawnstar, this mod is what you need.Please look at the pictures for more details/preview.
I hope you will enjoy the mod, and please submit your own screenshot.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Required mods[/color][/size][/b]
=============
None.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Install[/color][/size][/b]
=======
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Activates the selected mod\" button.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Manual install[/color][/size][/b]
==============
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\:
.- the Meshes folder
.- the Textures folder
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say \"Yes to all\".  

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Upgrade[/color][/size][/b]
=======
Not aplicable at this time.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Uninstall[/color][/size][/b]
=========
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Deactivates the selected mod\" button.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Manual uninstall[/color][/size][/b]
================
1. Delete:
.- the folder \\meshes\\that you have previously installed.
.- the folder \\Textures\\that you have previously installed.
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Incompatibility[/color][/size][/b]
===============
None known, but it will conflict with any mod that heavyly edit the bay of dawnstar.

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Known Issues or Bugs[/color][/size][/b]
====================
None

[b][size=3][color=\"#003391\"]Future plans[/color][/size][/b]
============
None

=======

You can email me IF i don\'t reply to your message on Nexus: reaper91_11@hotmail.com
